scripts.network: hc s clean && npm run build:happ && UI_PORT=8888 concurrently "npm start -w ui" "npm run launch:happ" "holochain-playground"
scripts.test: npm run build:happ && cargo nextest run -j 1
scripts.build:happ: npm run build:zome && hc app pack workdir/happ --recursive
scripts.docs:publish: npm run docs:setup && storybook build && gh-pages -d ./storybook-static -b gh-pages
scripts.docs:setup: npm run build -w @holochain-open-dev/peer-status && npm run analyze -w @holochain-open-dev/peer-status
